text: Instituto Español de Estudios Estratégicos (IEEE) is the research center of the Ministerio de Defensa of Spain who is responsible for coordinating, promoting and disseminating the cultural action of the ministry. It is part of the Centro Superior de Estudios de la Defensa Nacional (CESEDEN). Its publications are Cuadernos de Estrategia, Panorama Estratégico, Energía y Geoestrategia, and Revista Digital. ==References== ==External links== * Category:Think tanks based in Spain Category:Think tanks established in 1970 Category:Research institutes established in 1970
title: Instituto Español de Estudios Estratégicos
